alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 9:33PM CDT until March 26 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Up to 1 inch of additional accumulation possible before precipitation ends. Winds from the northwest at 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Dundy and Hitchcock Counties in Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CDT Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions associated with accumulating snow and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As of 930 PM CDT this evening, a band of moderate snow persists across the advisory area. Precipitation will gradually taper off and end from west to east overnight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, slow down, turn off cruise control, and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway on-ramps and off-ramps where accidents are more likely to occur. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
